field.name: searchFieldType
field.label: Search Field Type
field.description:
Select how your user search this field.
Exact: A single input field will be shown for searching listings with the exact number.
From X To Y: 2 input fields will be shown to allow users to search for listings within a range of 2 numbers. When only one of the number is provided, it will be used as the minimum or maximum cap.
Exactly/More Than/Less Than X: A select list and an input field will be shown to allow users to search for listings with exact, more than or less than the given value.

field.name: decimals
field.label: Decimals
field.description: Sets the number of decimal points.

field.name: decimalPoint
field.label: Decimal Point
field.description: Sets the separator for the decimal point. By default this is a dot (.).

field.name: useThousandSeparator
field.label: Use Thousand Separator
field.description: Choose whether to use thousand separator. If set to 'Yes', the thousand separator set below will be used.

field.name: thousandSeparator
field.label: Thousand Separator
field.description: Sets the thousands separator. By default this is a comma (,).

field.name: searchSliderMin
field.label: Slider Search Min. Value
field.description: If you're using the slider search, this sets the minimum value of the slider.

field.name: searchSliderMax
field.label: Slider Search Max. Value
field.description: If you're using the slider search, this sets the maximum value of the slider.

field.name: searchSliderStep
field.label: Slider Search Step
field.description: Determines the size or amount of each interval or step the slider takes between the min and max. The full specified value range of the slider (max - min) should be evenly divisible by the step.
